smudge.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a smudge of lipstick on the cup
smudge.translation[1].definitions[0].def: if ink, writing etc smudges, or if you smudge it, it becomes dirty and unclear because it has been touched or rubbed
smudge.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Don’t touch it! You’ll smudge the ink.
smudge.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to make a dirty mark on a surface
smudge.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Someone had smudged the paper with their greasy hands.
